text: Michael Gandolfini (born May 10, 1999) is an American actor. He has appeared in the television series The Deuce and the movie Ocean's 8. He starred as Tony Soprano in the movie The Many Saints of Newark (2021). His late father, actor James Gandolfini (1961â€“2013), also played Soprano in the HBO series The Sopranos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:New York University alumni
